Angular-Tone Demo

This is the Demo of angular-tone, an AngularJS wrapper for ToneJS to easily create Music Applications. It features the following UI Components:

Instrument

The intrument directive allows adding instruments directly over the template! There is nothing to see, but to hear. Inspect the code to learn how to add an instrument via the template.

Keyboard

Angular wrapper for Qwerty Hancock, with extra options to connect with ToneJS:

Poti

Mixer

The following Mixer controls the Synthesizers envelope and automatically generates potis for every parameter:

Pad

A pad is a button with two modes: switch (white/blue) and trigger (yellow). switch toggles it between on/off, trigger just activates the pad on mousedown. This pad is in mode trigger and plays a C4 with the instrument when clicked.

Matrix

A matrix is a collection of pads that acts as a unit. The following matrix consists of pads with mode=switch. Click to toggle on/off!

The yellow matrices consist of pads with mode=trigger. Click to trigger whole columns/rows of the above matrix to play all pads that are on!

Loop

A Loop has two pads: Play/Stop and Mute/Unmute:
